00025 class VoicemailFolder {
00026 
00028         private $folderName;
00029         private $lstVM;
00030         
00034         public function __construct($name="") {
00035                 $this->folderName = $name;
00036                 $this->lstVM = array();
00037         }
00038         
00042         public function __destruct() {
00043                 for( $i = count($this->lstVM) ; $i >= 0 ; $i-- ) {
00044                         array_pop($this->lstVM);
00045                 }
00046         }
00047         
00052         public function setName($name) {
00053                 $this->$folderName = $name;
00054         }
00055         
00060         public function getName() {
00061                 return $this->folderName;
00062         }
00063         
00068         public function getCount() {
00069                 return count($this->lstVM);
00070         }       
00071 
00076         public function getListVM() {
00077                 return $this->lstVM;
00078         }
00079         
00085         public function getVMByName($newName) {
00086                 foreach( $this->getListVM() as $vm ) {
00087                         if( strcmp($vm->getName(), $newName) == 0 ) {
00088                                 return $vm;
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091                 return NULL;
00092         }
00093         
00098         public function addVMail($vm) {
00099                 array_push($this->lstVM, $vm);
00100         }
00101         
00108         public function rename($oldName, $newName) {
00109                 foreach( $this->getListVM() as $vm ) {
00110                         if( strcmp($vm->getName(), $oldName) == 0 ) {
00111                                 $vm->setName( $newName );
00112                                 foreach( $vm->getFormats() as $format ) {
00113                                         $arr = explode(".", $format);
00114                                         $new = $newName .".". $arr[count($arr)-1];
00115                                 }
00116                                 return "OK";
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119                 return "Didn't find folder";
00120         }
00121         
00125         public function toShortString() {
00126                 $ret = "<directory name=\"". $this->getName() ."\" count=\"". $this->getCount() ."\">";
00127                 if( $this->getCount() != 0 ) {
00128                         $ret .= "\n";
00129 //                      foreach( $this->lstVM as $vm ) {
00130 //                              $ret .= $vm->toShortString();
00131 //                      }
00132 //                      $ret .= "  ";
00133                 }
00134                 $ret .= "</directory>\n";
00135                 return $ret;
00136         }
00137         
00141         public function toString() {
00142                 $ret = "<directory name=\"". $this->getName() ."\" count=\"". $this->getCount() ."\">";

00144 //                      $ret .= "\n";

00147                         }
